definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment h="84" pinned="false" w="254">This example will test for a specific block below what is running the procedure. If it is true, then it will run what you place in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcblocks"><value name="a"><block type="world_data_blockat"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.FIRE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="block_remove"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="spawn_particle_multi"><field name="particle">SMOKE_NORMAL</field><value name="count"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="dx"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.3</field></block></value><value name="dy"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="dz"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.3</field></block></value><value name="speed"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">block.fire.extinguish</field><field name="soundcategory">block</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
